name: Godflinger
description:
This game was made over the weekend of November 25th, 2020 thru November 27th, 2022 as part of the Bad MamaJAMa Game Jam hosted by students at NSCC Truro Campus in Nova Scotia, Canada. 

The Jam theme was "you are the projectile".

Our team of three created this game, where you are an arrow travelling across the countryside piercing all who stand in your way, including skeleton archers, angry gorillas,  and vicious owls in hats.

By: Ryan Wohler, Richard Clarke, and Balazs Kiss
